titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that Federally funded school lunches should provide optional meatless meals.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 8/3/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that federally funded school lunch programs should provide nutritious meatless meals for students who conscientiously believe such meals to be best for themselves.
